TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> So we can join?

If you pass the test.
PARTAY!!!
uh-huh, i\'m awaiting activation

> 
> uh-huh, i\'m awaiting activation

Just got it man.

I just had a look around the forum....all I can say now is this

![oh-god-why.jpg](http://cdn.electricpig.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/oh-god-why.jpg)

while I was happy, awaiting the Spearkan Federations return, i only saw the opposite of what i expected

1. 50\'s tech, if i wanted to RP, this would be with Spaceships and future tech and swag like that...or at least Modern tech

2. Insanity, the owner of my land (which seems to be the UoSoV) trying to wage war and other RP\'ers breaking rules...also a cold war?

3.the rules seem too loose, there is an extreme use of point systems troubles me, since there can be balance issues, to me, the amount of points are completely dependent on A-area of country B-climate of country C-terrain of Country

seriously considering not starting now

> 
> I just had a look around the forum....all I can say now is this
> 
> ![oh-god-why.jpg](http://cdn.electricpig.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/oh-god-why.jpg)
> 
> while I was happy, awaiting the Spearkan Federations return, i only saw the opposite of what i expected
> 
> 1. 50\'s tech, if i wanted to RP, this would be with Spaceships and future tech and swag like that...or at least Modern tech
> 
> 2. Insanity, the owner of my land (which seems to be the UoSoV) trying to wage war and other RP\'ers breaking rules...also a cold war?
> 
> 3.the rules seem too loose, there is an extreme use of point systems troubles me, since there can be balance issues, to me, the amount of points are completely dependent on A-area of country B-climate of country C-terrain of Country
> 
> seriously considering not starting now

The tech is temporary, and now we\'re at 60s tech. We\'ll eventually get to modern tech.

The UoSoV no longer holds Spearka. It\'s up to the Warsaw Pact RCK if you get it back.

The rules are a tad loose, the points can be a bit annoying, but it\'s to prevent godmodding and such. The points are mainly dependent on size, but technocracies seem to get like 2 extra points or something... I don\'t know. PP expand with colonization and time. And yes, those who claim the biggest chunk usually win.
Or colonize the most.
Technocracies get the same number of PP points as everyone else.

I must agree with the last one, though, what Radion did with the PP system he should have done with the rules instead. Not only are they subject to massive abuse, several points are also simply uncovered. Be aware, though, actual rule breaks are yet to happen, accusations, though, you will find these by the kilotons.
What the ??? just happened now? I got another Error 404.
Oooh boy...

> 
> Warning: Unknown: open\_basedir restriction in effect. File(/www/krp.net78.net/index.php) is not within the allowed path(s): (/home/:/usr/lib/php:/tmp) in Unknown on line 0
> PHP Error Message 
> 
> Warning: Unknown: failed to open stream: Operation not permitted in Unknown on line 0
> 
> PHP Error Message 
> 
> Fatal error: Unknown: Failed opening required \'/www/krp.net78.net/index.php\' (include\_path=\'.:/usr/lib/php:/usr/local/lib/php\') in Unknown on line 0

> 
> Warning: Unknown: open\_basedir restriction in effect. File(/www/krp.net78.net/index.php) is not within the allowed path(s): (/home/:/usr/lib/php:/tmp) in Unknown on line 0
>

> Fatal error: Unknown: Failed opening required \'/www/krp.net78.net/index.php\' (include\_path=\'.:/usr/lib/php:/usr/local/lib/php\') in Unknown on line 0

That\'s internet protocol for \'\'Problem Officer?\'\'

> 
> Oooh boy...

So, shall we go towards my forum, and do I need to restructure it now?
The PHP is failing because is it pointing to a page that currently doesn\'t exist. Unfortunately, the whole site\'s been taken down again.
now showing the \'exceeded bandwidth\' page.
A quick suggestion would be for everyone to turn off PM email alerts. Thats probably what setting it off, now Radion has to send another email asking for it to be unsuspended.

> 
> The PHP is failing because is it pointing to a page that currently doesn\'t exist. Unfortunately, the whole site\'s been taken down again.

What site is it!? I blame the web host. Lets just move to my forum. If Radion acquired the info. And not getting that Dwarf

> 
> A quick suggestion would be for everyone to turn off PM email alerts. Thats probably what setting it off, now Radion has to send another email asking for it to be unsuspended.

And the 64,000 dollars go to BHD!
It is the web host, it\'s the same thing again with the emails. It\'s probably the PM alerts, notice how it happened immediately after adding LW to the RCK PM conversation.

> 
> It is the web host, it\'s the same thing again with the emails. It\'s probably the PM alerts, notice how it happened immediately after adding LW to the RCK PM conversation.

So you blame me, wonderful. How about everyone but the Admin turns off E-mail alerts
You can\'t blame the PM\'s on the inside, it was going smoothly for weeks where we sent group PM\'s in the dozens, then suddenly it goes off, and does it again shortly afterwards.

> 
> You can\'t blame the PM\'s on the inside, it was going smoothly for weeks where we sent group PM\'s in the dozens, then suddenly it goes off, and does it again shortly afterwards.

How many people were in it per conversation.

> 
> How many people were in it per conversation.

at first, just about 5, but then it got to the 7-8 and eventually 9 we have now.

If we are talking amount by time, this makes no sense, if we are talking amount at once, it might.
and it\'s gone.
